Tool Call.requirements_text: Our e-commerce platform needs to manage customer orders, product inventory, and payment processing. Customers must register with valid email addresses and can place multiple orders. Each order contains one or more products with quantities and pricing. Products have categories, stock levels, and supplier information. Payment must be processed within 24 hours and customers should receive email confirmations. We need to track order status from pending to shipped to delivered. Inventory levels must be automatically updated when orders are placed and we need to generate reports on sales performance and low stock alerts.

business_rules: Customers must register with valid email addresses
Payment must be processed within 24 hours
Inventory levels must be automatically updated when orders are placed
Order status must be tracked from pending to shipped to delivered
data_requirements: Store customer registration data with email validation
Store product quantities and pricing per order
Maintain product categories and stock levels
Track order status changes over time
